text: Mary Elizabeth Winstead (born November 28, 1984) is an American motion picture and television actress. She is known for roles in many feature films, with horror movies and sequels to Die Hard. Her recent TV roles include the comedy series BrainDead (2016), medical drama Mercy Street (2016-17), and black comedy Fargo (2017). She played Jessica in the soap opera Passions (1999-2000). She played Lucy McClane in Live Free or Die Hard (2007). She also played the scream queen in many horror pictures, including Black Christmas and Final Destination 3. In 2020, she played Huntress in Birds of Prey. Winstead was born in Rocky Mount, North Carolina. She was raised in Utah. In 2017, she began dating actor Ewan McGregor. They have one son, Laurie. McGregory and Winstead got married in April 2022. ==References== Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:Actors from Utah Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American Baptists Category:People from Rocky Mount, North Carolina
title: Mary Elizabeth Winstead
